definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Variable capacitor soldering joints made with RG213 coaxial braid.
sentences.chinese: 可变电容器的焊点与RG213同轴电缆编织的连接。

sentences.english: The water tank without welds, excellent corrosion resistance, long service life.
sentences.chinese: 水箱内胆无焊点焊缝，耐腐蚀性能绝佳，寿命长。

sentences.english: Less residue, shinny and clean solder spot.
sentences.chinese: 残留物少，焊点光泽，干净。

sentences.english: As a result of repeated thermal cycling, fatigue cracks developed in the solder interconnects .
sentences.chinese: 随着热循环周数的增加，焊点中出现疲劳裂纹。

sentences.english: Subsequent growth of the fatigue cracks led to final fracture of the solder interconnects .
sentences.chinese: 疲劳裂纹随后的生长导致了焊点的最终断裂。

sentences.english: Galvanized sheet is readily spot- or seam-welded, but arc gas welding will boil off the zinc coating.
sentences.chinese: 镀锌板上有焊点或焊缝，但是电弧焊会烧掉锌层。

definition: bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
